name: Mortefi
description: Mortefi, a skilled expert in Applied Tacetite Study and a member of the Academy’s Department of Safety, possesses the unique ability to transform his accumulated frustration into fiery flames. From a burning wrath that consumes all, the red dragon shall descend.

details.Basic Attack: Use dual guns and fire up to 4 continuous attacks, dealing Fusion DMG.
details.Heavy Attack: Enter aiming state for a more powerful shot. The aimed shot fired after charging deals Fusion DMG.
details.Mid-air Attack: Consume Stamina to perform consecutive mid-air shots, dealing Fusion DMG.
details.Dodge Counter: Use Basic Attack after a successful Dodge to attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

details.Skill: Launch high-speed flame lightning forward, dealing Fusion DMG.
Deal Fusion DMG and apply Burning Rhapsody to all characters in the team.
details.Burning Rhapsody: When the on-field character’s Basic Attack hits, Mortefi launches a Coordinated Attack, firing 1 Marcato. When Heavy Attack hits, fires 2 Marcato. Can launch one Coordinated Attack every 0.35s.

details.Resonance Skill: Fury Fugue: When Mortefi’s Annoyance reaches 100, his Resonance Skill is replaced with Fury Fugue. Casting consumes all Annoyance to unleash high-speed flame lightning, dealing Fusion DMG (considered Resonance Skill DMG).
details.Annoyance: Can hold up to 100. Restored when Normal Attack Impromptu Show hits; restored when Intro Skill Dissonance hits; restored when Passionate Variation hits; within 5s after Passionate Variation, Basic Attack Impromptu that hits additionally restores Annoyance.

inherent_skill1.name: Harmonic Control
inherent_skill1.description: After casting Resonance Skill Passionate Variation, the damage of Resonance Skill Draconic Hellfire is increased by 25% for 8s.

inherent_skill2.name: Rhythmic Vibrato
inherent_skill2.description: During Resonance Liberation Burning Rhapsody, each hit of Marcato increases the damage of the next Marcato by 1.5%, once every 0.35s, stacking up to 50 times. Resets when Burning Rhapsody ends.

intro_skill.name: Dissonance
intro_skill.description: Attack the target, dealing Fusion DMG.

outro_skill.name: Rage Transposition
outro_skill.description: The next character (or a nearby ally that activates an Outro Skill) gains 38% Heavy Attack DMG Deepen for 14s or until switched.

resonance_chain.s1: During Burning Rhapsody, launches Coordinated Attacks when the on-field character uses Resonance Skills, firing 2 Marcato hits that deal Fusion Damage.
resonance_chain.s2: After using the Echo Skill, restores an additional 10 Resonance Energy (once every 20s).
resonance_chain.s3: During Burning Rhapsody, the Crit DMG of Resonance Liberation’s Marcato is increased by 30%.
resonance_chain.s5: When Passionate Variation or Fury Fugue hits a target, fires 4 Marcato hits that deal Fusion Damage; these hits deal 50% reduced DMG.
resonance_chain.s6: When Violent Finale is cast, increases ATK of all team members by 20% for 20s.
